data.name: Gravity Flux
data.detailed_description:
Gravity Flux is a local multiplayer (everyone plays on the same PC) 2D shooter fighting game.
You play as robots that have been built for testing in an environment where the gravity strength changes randomly over time.
Shoot at other player to get kills!
Get the most kills to win!
When gravity changes, the gameplay changes, so it becomes less platforming, instead more flying around.

Features:
  • 3 levels (more planned)
  • Full controller support
  • Windows, MacOS (latest) and Linux support
  • Player statistics that you can see in-game
  • More features, like AI, new weapons, and per-person stats are planned.

First made at a local Tasmanian game jam in 2018, the game has been expanded into a full game.

Very simple, but addictive!

Please see my Discord server or contact page if you have any issues or feedback.
